an4.91:4.3: Asuro asuraparivāro, asuro devaparivāro, devo asuraparivāro, devo devaparivāro.
an4.91:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivāro?
an4.91:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo, parisāpissa hoti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4.91:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivāro.
an4.91:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti devaparivāro?
an4.91:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo, parisā ca khvassa hoti sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā.
an4.91:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti devaparivāro.
an4.91:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivāro?
an4.91:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, parisā ca khvassa hoti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4.91:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivāro.
an4.91:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti devaparivāro?
an4.91:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, parisāpissa hoti sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā.
an4.91:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti, devaparivāro.
an4.91:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
